results.title: An integrated virtual screening and drug repurposing strategy for the discovery of new antimalarial drugs against Plasmodium falciparum phosphatidylinositol 3-kinase.
results.text_hl: Our investigations suggest that @CHEMICAL_oxethazaine @CHEMICAL_MESH:C100289 @@@oxetacaine@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@, @CHEMICAL_repaglinide @CHEMICAL_MESH:C072379 @@@repaglinide@@@, aclidinium, @CHEMICAL_Propafenone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011405 @@@propafenone@@@, and @CHEMICAL_Lovastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008148 @@@lovastatin@@@ could be repurposed for @<m>DISEASE_Malaria</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008288 @@@malaria@@@ control and prevention.

citations.NLM: Verma K, Lahariya AK, Dubey S, Verma AK, Das A, Schneider KA, Bharti PK. An integrated virtual screening and drug repurposing strategy for the discovery of new antimalarial drugs against Plasmodium falciparum phosphatidylinositol 3-kinase. J Cell Biochem. 2021 Oct;122(10):1326-1336. PMID: 33998049
